dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT TRIM(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'FMDay, Month DD, yyyy')) curr_date FROM DUAL

SELECT (SELECT loc.location_name || DECODE(loc.city,NULL,NULL,','||loc.city) || DECODE(loc.province_code,NULL,NULL,',' || loc.province_code) FROM location loc WHERE 1 = 1 AND loc.location_gid = sh.source_location_gid) || ' -> ' || (SELECT loc.location_name || DECODE(loc.city,NULL,NULL,','||loc.city) || DECODE(loc.province_code,NULL,NULL,',' || loc.province_code) FROM location loc WHERE 1 = 1 AND loc.location_gid = sh.dest_location_gid) soudest, sh.source_location_gid l_source, sh.dest_location_gid l_dest, SUM(DECODE(TO_DATE(TO_CHAR((FROM_TZ(TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(sh.end_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'GMT') AT TIME ZONE loc2.time_zone_gid),'MM/DD/YYYY'),'MM/DD/YYYY') - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR((FROM_TZ(TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(sh.start_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'GMT') AT TIME ZONE loc1.time_zone_gid),'MM/DD/YYYY'),'MM/DD/YYYY'),0,1, (TO_DATE(TO_CHAR((FROM_TZ(TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(sh.end_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'GMT') AT TIME ZONE loc2.time_zone_gid),'MM/DD/YYYY'),'MM/DD/YYYY') - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR((FROM_TZ(TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(sh.start_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'GMT') AT TIME ZONE loc1.time_zone_gid),'MM/DD/YYYY'),'MM/DD/YYYY')))) / COUNT(*) avg FROM shipment sh INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sh_ref ON sh.shipment_gid = sh_ref.shipment_gid AND sh_ref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid LIKE '%LOC_CODE%' INNER JOIN location loc ON sh.servprov_gid = loc.location_gid INNER JOIN location loc1 ON sh.source_location_gid = loc1.location_gid INNER JOIN location loc2 ON sh.dest_location_gid = loc2.location_gid WHERE 1 = 1 AND :P_RUN = 'FINAL' GROUP BY sh.source_location_gid, sh.dest_location_gid UNION SELECT NVL((SELECT loc.location_name || DECODE(loc.city,NULL,NULL,','||loc.city) || DECODE(loc.province_code,NULL,NULL,',' || loc.province_code) FROM location loc WHERE 1 = 1 AND loc.location_gid = sh.source_location_gid) || ' -> ' || (SELECT loc.location_name || DECODE(loc.city,NULL,NULL,','||loc.city) || DECODE(loc.province_code,NULL,NULL,',' || loc.province_code) FROM location loc WHERE 1 = 1 AND loc.location_gid = sh.dest_location_gid),'Data Missing in System') soudest, sh.source_location_gid l_source, sh.dest_location_gid l_dest, SUM(DECODE(TO_DATE(TO_CHAR((FROM_TZ(TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(sh.end_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'GMT') AT TIME ZONE loc2.time_zone_gid),'MM/DD/YYYY'),'MM/DD/YYYY') - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR((FROM_TZ(TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(sh.start_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'GMT') AT TIME ZONE loc1.time_zone_gid),'MM/DD/YYYY'),'MM/DD/YYYY'),0,1, (TO_DATE(TO_CHAR((FROM_TZ(TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(sh.end_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'GMT') AT TIME ZONE loc2.time_zone_gid),'MM/DD/YYYY'),'MM/DD/YYYY') - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR((FROM_TZ(TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(sh.start_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'GMT') AT TIME ZONE loc1.time_zone_gid),'MM/DD/YYYY'),'MM/DD/YYYY')))) / COUNT(*) avg FROM shipment sh INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sh_ref ON sh.shipment_gid = sh_ref.shipment_gid AND sh_ref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid LIKE '%LOC_CODE%' INNER JOIN location loc ON sh.servprov_gid = loc.location_gid INNER JOIN location loc1 ON sh.source_location_gid = loc1.location_gid INNER JOIN location loc2 ON sh.dest_location_gid = loc2.location_gid WHERE 1 = 1 AND :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' GROUP BY sh.source_location_gid, sh.dest_location_gid

SELECT sh.dest_location_gid, sh_ref.shipment_refnum_value loc, loc.location_name carrier, (SELECT ssur.refnum_value FROM s_ship_unit_refnum ssur INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum_qual ssurq ON ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = ssurq.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid WHERE ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssurq.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_xid = 'CONTAINER ID' AND ROWNUM = 1) car, TO_CHAR((FROM_TZ(TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(sh.start_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'GMT') AT TIME ZONE loc1.time_zone_gid),'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI') || ' ' || loc1.time_zone_gid actual_pickup, TO_CHAR((FROM_TZ(TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(sh.end_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'GMT') AT TIME ZONE loc2.time_zone_gid),'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI') || ' ' || loc2.time_zone_gid actual_delivery, DECODE(TO_DATE(TO_CHAR((FROM_TZ(TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(sh.end_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'GMT') AT TIME ZONE loc2.time_zone_gid),'MM/DD/YYYY'),'MM/DD/YYYY') - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR((FROM_TZ(TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(sh.start_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'GMT') AT TIME ZONE loc1.time_zone_gid),'MM/DD/YYYY'),'MM/DD/YYYY'),0,1, TO_DATE(TO_CHAR((FROM_TZ(TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(sh.end_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'GMT') AT TIME ZONE loc2.time_zone_gid),'MM/DD/YYYY'),'MM/DD/YYYY') - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR((FROM_TZ(TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(sh.start_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'GMT') AT TIME ZONE loc1.time_zone_gid),'MM/DD/YYYY'),'MM/DD/YYYY')) days, sh.shipment_gid FROM shipment sh INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sh_ref ON sh.shipment_gid = sh_ref.shipment_gid AND sh_ref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid LIKE '%LOC_CODE%' INNER JOIN location loc ON sh.servprov_gid = loc.location_gid INNER JOIN location loc1 ON sh.source_location_gid = loc1.location_gid INNER JOIN location loc2 ON sh.dest_location_gid = loc2.location_gid INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON ssd.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND :P_RUN = 'FINAL' AND sh.source_location_gid = :l_source AND sh.dest_location_gid = :l_dest UNION SELECT sh.dest_location_gid, NVL(sh_ref.shipment_refnum_value,'Data Missing in System') loc, NVL(loc.location_name,'Data Missing in System') carrier, NVL((SELECT ssur.refnum_value FROM s_ship_unit_refnum ssur INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum_qual ssurq ON ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = ssurq.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid WHERE ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssurq.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_xid = 'CONTAINER ID' AND ROWNUM = 1),'Data Missing in System') car, NVL(TO_CHAR((FROM_TZ(TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(sh.start_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'GMT') AT TIME ZONE loc1.time_zone_gid),'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI') || ' ' || loc1.time_zone_gid,'Data Missing in System') actual_pickup, NVL(TO_CHAR((FROM_TZ(TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(sh.end_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'GMT') AT TIME ZONE loc2.time_zone_gid),'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI') || ' ' || loc2.time_zone_gid,'Data Missing in System') actual_delivery, DECODE(TO_DATE(TO_CHAR((FROM_TZ(TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(sh.end_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'GMT') AT TIME ZONE loc2.time_zone_gid),'MM/DD/YYYY'),'MM/DD/YYYY') - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR((FROM_TZ(TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(sh.start_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'GMT') AT TIME ZONE loc1.time_zone_gid),'MM/DD/YYYY'),'MM/DD/YYYY'),0,1, TO_DATE(TO_CHAR((FROM_TZ(TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(sh.end_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'GMT') AT TIME ZONE loc2.time_zone_gid),'MM/DD/YYYY'),'MM/DD/YYYY') - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR((FROM_TZ(TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(sh.start_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'GMT') AT TIME ZONE loc1.time_zone_gid),'MM/DD/YYYY'),'MM/DD/YYYY')) days, sh.shipment_gid FROM shipment sh INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sh_ref ON sh.shipment_gid = sh_ref.shipment_gid AND sh_ref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid LIKE '%LOC_CODE%' INNER JOIN location loc ON sh.servprov_gid = loc.location_gid INNER JOIN location loc1 ON sh.source_location_gid = loc1.location_gid INNER JOIN location loc2 ON sh.dest_location_gid = loc2.location_gid INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON ssd.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' AND sh.source_location_gid = :l_source AND sh.dest_location_gid = :l_dest
